title: Tennis instruction series
creator_credit: Dr Frank Ryan and Ryan Films
brief_description: The popularity of tennis is shared by all ages and most countries of the world. Shows the basic rules of tennis, demonstrates how the ball should be hit to produce various shots and strokes. Stresses the importance of good service, strong body and leg muscles, top physical condition, good foot work and co-ordination between mind, eye and body.
